description: This file defines the StaffProvider class, which manages staff data for a kindergarten management system. It handles loading, adding, updating, and deleting staff members, and notifies listeners of changes.

classes.name: StaffProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages staff data, supports asynchronous CRUD operations, and provides data filtering based on roles.

methods.name: loadStaff
methods.description: Fetches the list of staff from the database and updates internal state.

methods.name: addStaff
methods.description: Adds a new staff member to the database and updates the local list.

methods.name: updateStaff
methods.description: Updates an existing staff member's data in the database and local list.

methods.name: deleteStaff
methods.description: Removes a staff member from the database and local list based on ID.

methods.name: getTeachers
methods.description: Filters and returns staff members with the role of teacher.

methods.name: getStaffById
methods.description: Retrieves a staff member by their ID.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Private method to toggle loading state and notify listeners.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Resets the error state and notifies listeners.
